name: Out of Limbs
description:
Run 'n' gun through as many rooms as you can in 60 seconds while avoiding your limbs being blown off by enemies!       
> CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

R - Reload

> CREDITS:

Art - Matt Snyder

Programming - Jake Honey

Music - Nicole Marie

> WOWIE 3.0 Game Jam (2/29/2021) Theme: Failure is Progress

How does "Out of Limbs" fit the theme?

You can never actually "fail". If an enemy damages you, you lose a limb and get a debuff (EXAMPLE: lose your leg, - 5 speed), but you are always able to make progress towards a higher score even when you "fail" after losing your limbs.

HIGH SCORE:

We ran out of time before we could implement the high score system into the game. 

>>Current High Score: Jake (12 Rooms Completed)
